results.title: eToro shares pop 20% as crypto revenues bolster Q4 earnings
results.description: eToro CEO Yoni Assia says he is positioning the trading platform “for a financial system that is increasingly moving on-chain,” after its crypto revenues boosted earnings in Q4.

results.title: Zora debuts attention markets on Solana, betting on social trends
results.description: The ZORA token gained 6.2% to $0.022 over the last 24 hours as Zora announced its new attention markets product.

results.title: Federal Appeals Court Rejects Kalshi Bid to Pause Nevada Enforcement
results.description: The ruling clears a path for state action, leaving predictions-market operator Kalshi with limited options, according to one legal expert.

results.title: Why Bitcoin Open Interest Has Seen Its Largest Decline in Almost 3 Years
results.description: Bitcoin open interest has plunged 55% from its October 2025 peak, marking the steepest decline since April 2023 as traders unwind leverage.

results.title: Ether bulls target $2.5K as staking ETF launch, RWA market cap reflect growth
results.description: Ether adoption grows as major endowments shift capital, BlackRock launches a staking ETF and Ethereum's real-world asset dominance highlights TradFi investor interest.

results.title: Precious Metals Royalties Firm to Offer Dividends in Tether's Tokenized Gold
results.description: Elemental Royalty said investors will be able to receive dividends in Tether’s XAUT, establishing a novel use case for tokenized gold.

results.title: Stripe-Owned Bridge Gains National Bank Trust Charter to Boost Stablecoin Offerings
results.description: Bridge, the stablecoin firm of payments giant Stripe, was awarded conditional approval for a national trust banking charter.

results.title: Stripe-owned Bridge gets OCC conditional approval for national bank charter
results.description: While still subject to final approval, the regulator's nod would enable Bridge to offer stablecoin and digital asset services to businesses.

results.title: Quantoz gains Visa nod to issue stablecoin-linked debit cards in Europe
results.description: The Dutch electronic money issuer will act as a BIN sponsor for fintech partners, linking regulated dollar- and euro-denominated tokens to mainstream card rails.

results.title: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Addresses “Paper Bitcoin” Claims, Claims Bitcoin ETFs Are Fully Backed
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong Addresses “Paper Bitcoin” Claims, Claims Bitcoin ETFs Are Fully Backed Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong dismissed “paper Bitcoin” claims, insisting spot Bitcoin ETFs are fully backed, while defending Coinbase’s dominant custody role and calling U.S. regulatory clarity the next key step for the industry. results.title: HIVE Digital posts 219% revenue jump as miner-AI hybrid strategy gains traction
results.description: Third-quarter results show revenue growth despite lower Bitcoin prices, alongside new AI computing contracts, as HIVE continues to expand beyond its core mining business.

results.title: Abu Dhabi Funds Boosted BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Exposure to $1 Billion by End of 2025: Filings
results.description: Abu Dhabi funds added to their Bitcoin exposure in Q4, jumping to more than $1 billion worth of IBIT at the conclusion of the year.

results.title: Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer Overtakes MARA, Establishing Hash Rate Lead: JPMorgan
results.description: Bitcoin miner Bitdeer has overtaken MARA in terms of self-mining hash rate among publicly traded companies, according to JPMorgan analysts.

results.title: New Bitcoin whales are trapped underwater, but for how long?
results.description: The gap between new and old Bitcoin whales continues to widen as BTC trades below $68,000. Will young whales continue to accumulate, or will older whales capitulate first?

results.title: Traders pinpoint three price targets for Bitcoin if $70K holds as resistance
results.description: Traders map out their desired price targets for Bitcoin if the $70,000 level continues to function as a resistance zone. Is there any hope for the bulls?

results.title: Bitcoin chart pattern, whale activity warn of another 20% price drop
results.description: Bitcoin has formed a classic bearish pattern on its daily chart, and if confirmed, a price drop to $56,000 could be on the cards.

results.title: Kraken integrates with ICE Chat to expand institutional OTC access
results.description: The integration gives ICE Chat users direct access to the exchange's OTC crypto liquidity, embedding digital asset trading within established institutional workflows.

results.title: Gemini Stock Dives as Winklevoss-Led Crypto Exchange Dumps Executives
results.description: Shares in publicly traded crypto exchange Gemini are plunging as the firm parts ways with three executives following broader layoffs.

results.title: Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Boosts Bitcoin ETF Holdings to $630 Million
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Boosts Bitcoin ETF Holdings to $630 Million Abu Dhabi investment vehicles together held over 20 million shares of BlackRock’s Bitcoin IBIT at the close of last year, with a combined value exceeding $1.1 billion. This post Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Boosts Bitcoin ETF Holdings to $630 Million first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Satoshi’s Exercise for the Reader
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Satoshi’s Exercise for the Reader The Bitcoin whitepaper is clear about Bitcoin’s core feature: it is permissionless. Anyone in the world can pay anyone by joining the peer-to-peer network and broadcasting a transaction. results.title: Tom Lee Expects 'Defining Year for Ethereum' as BitMine Buys ETH Amid 'Rock Bottom' Vibes
results.description: BitMine Immersion Technologies is sitting on a nearly $8 billion unrealized loss, but Tom Lee remains optimistic about Ethereum.

results.title: Is the Netherlands Taxing Unrealized Crypto Gains? It's Complicated
results.description: From 2028, the Netherlands will update how tax is calculated on unrealized gains. Crypto critics are in uproar—but the reality is nuanced.

results.title: Strategy’s Bitcoin Buying Accelerates as $48 Billion BTC Stash Sits Underwater
results.description: Strategy reported its fourth-largest Bitcoin purchase of the year, a week after Michael Saylor's defense of the company's became a meme.

results.title: Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit Tokyo-based bitcoin treasury firm Metaplanet reported a fiscal 2025 net loss of 95 billion yen ($619 million), largely due to a 102.2 billion yen ($666 million) drop in the value of its bitcoin holdings. This post Metaplanet Reports $619 Million Loss as Bitcoin Holdings Take Hit first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive Key levels in focus: $65,650 support holds for now, but break below opens $63,000 then Fibonacci $57,800; resistance caps upside at $71,800–$74,500. This post Bitcoin Bears Dominate: Failure to Break $71,800 Keeps Downside Risk Alive first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Ethan Greene - Feral Analysis and Juan Galt.
